sys_script_include.name: FoundationHealthAnalyzer

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_cf64d1448392321083e1b4a6feaad3a7
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1310794_founda_0.FoundationHealthAnalyzer</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>FoundationHealthAnalyzer</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var FoundationHealthAnalyzer = Class.create();
FoundationHealthAnalyzer.prototype = {
    initialize: function(tableName, analysisId) {
        this.tableName = tableName;
        this.analysisId = analysisId;
        this.results = {
            table: tableName,
            timestamp: new GlideDateTime().getDisplayValue(),
            findings: {},
            recommendations: [],
            health_score: 0
        };
    },
    
    analyzeCustomFields: function() {
        var fields = [];
        var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
        gr.addQuery('name', this.tableName);
        gr.addQuery('internal_type', 'custom');
        gr.orderBy('element');
        gr.query();
        
        while (gr.next()) {
            var fieldInfo = {
                name: gr.element + '',
                label: gr.label + '',
                type: gr.internal_type + '',
                mandatory: gr.mandatory + '',
                max_length: gr.max_length + ''
            };
            
            // Calculer le taux de remplissage
            fieldInfo.fill_rate = this.calculateFillRate(gr.element);
            fields.push(fieldInfo);
        }
        
        this.results.findings.custom_fields = fields;
        return fields.length;
    },
    
    calculateFillRate: function(fieldName) {
        var count = new GlideAggregate(this.tableName);
        count.addQuery(fieldName, '!=', '');
        count.addQuery(fieldName, 'ISNOTEMPTY');
        count.addAggregate('COUNT');
        count.query();
        
        if (count.next()) {
            var filled = count.getAggregate('COUNT');
            
            var total = new GlideAggregate(this.tableName);
            total.addAggregate('COUNT');
            total.query();
            total.next();
            var totalCount = total.getAggregate('COUNT');
            
            return Math.round((filled / totalCount) * 100) + '%';
        }
        return '0%';
    },
    
    analyzeDependencies: function() {
        var deps = {
            business_rules: [],
            acls: [],
            ui_policies: [],
            client_scripts: []
        };
        
        // Analyser les Business Rules
        var br = new GlideRecord('sys_script');
        br.addQuery('collection', this.tableName);
        br.query();
        while (br.next()) {
            deps.business_rules.push({
                name: br.name + '',
                active: br.active + '',
                when: br.when + ''
            });
        }
        
        // Analyser les ACLs
        var acl = new GlideRecord('sys_security_acl');
        acl.addQuery('name', 'STARTSWITH', this.tableName);
        acl.query();
        while (acl.next()) {
            deps.acls.push({
                name: acl.name + '',
                operation: acl.operation + '',
                active: acl.active + ''
            });
        }
        
        this.results.findings.dependencies = deps;
        return deps;
    },
    
    calculateHealthScore: function() {
        var score = 100;
        
        // Pénalités
        var customFields = this.results.findings.custom_fields || [];
        score -= customFields.length * 2; // -2 points par champ custom
        
        // Bonus pour les champs bien remplis
        customFields.forEach(function(field) {
            var fillRate = parseInt(field.fill_rate);
            if (fillRate > 90) score += 1;
            if (fillRate < 10) score -= 5;
        });
        
        this.results.health_score = Math.max(0, Math.min(100, score));
        return this.results.health_score;
    },
    
    generateRecommendations: function() {
        var recs = [];
        var fields = this.results.findings.custom_fields || [];
        
        fields.forEach(function(field) {
            var fillRate = parseInt(field.fill_rate);
            
            if (fillRate < 10) {
                recs.push({
                    field: field.name,
                    action: 'SUPPRIMER',
                    reason: 'Taux de remplissage trop faible (' + field.fill_rate + ')',
                    priority: 'HIGH',
                    effort: 'LOW'
                });
            }
            
            // Détecter les doublons potentiels avec OOTB
            if (field.name.indexOf('u_') === 0) {
                var baseName = field.name.substring(2);
                if (this.ootbFieldExists(baseName)) {
                    recs.push({
                        field: field.name,
                        action: 'CONSOLIDER',
                        reason: 'Doublon potentiel avec champ OOTB: ' + baseName,
                        priority: 'MEDIUM',
                        effort: 'MEDIUM'
                    });
                }
            }
        }, this);
        
        this.results.recommendations = recs;
        return recs;
    },
    
    ootbFieldExists: function(fieldName) {
        var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_dictionary');
        gr.addQuery('name', this.tableName);
        gr.addQuery('element', fieldName);
        gr.addQuery('internal_type', '!=', 'custom');
        gr.query();
        return gr.hasNext();
    },
    
    saveResults: function() {
        var gr = new GlideRecord('u_fha_results');
        if (gr.get(this.analysisId)) {
            gr.health_score = this.results.health_score;
            gr.summary = JSON.stringify(this.results);
            gr.status = 'Terminé';
            gr.update();
        }
        return this.results;
    },
    
    type: 'FoundationHealthAnalyzer'
};
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2026-01-02 19:31:55</sys_created_on><sys_id>cf64d1448392321083e1b4a6feaad3a7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>FoundationHealthAnalyzer</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Foundation Health Analyzer" source="x_1310794_founda_0">d852994c8312321083e1b4a6feaad3e6</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Foundation Health Analyzer">d852994c8312321083e1b4a6feaad3e6</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_cf64d1448392321083e1b4a6feaad3a7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2026-01-02 19:31:55</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
